marquees.marquee.text: str(tod())+": There are "+1 in $L.results+" problems assigned to SOFTWARE"
str(tod())+": There are "+2 in $L.results+" problems assigned to CLIENT SECURITY"
str(tod())+": There are "+3 in $L.results+" problems assigned to FIELD ENG."
str(tod())+": There are "+4 in $L.results+" problems assigned to LAN SUPPORT"

str(tod())+": There are "+12 in $L.results+" problems assigned to WAN SUPPORT"

expressions.expressions: $L.color1="White";if (val(1 in $L.results)>3) then ($L.color1="Green");if (val(1 in $L.results)>5) then ($L.color1="Yellow");if (val(1 in $L.results)>10) then ($L.color1="Red")
